column2: an A.M. Eatery////If you want an awesome breakfast
column3: this is the place to grab a plate! The food is absolutely delicious
column4: and you can't go wrong with anything on the menu. To make brunch a bit more fun
column5: the drink menu is great ... mimosa's are good
column6: but I'm a huge fan of the "Boss Hog" bloody mary ... bourbon
column8: and a tangy bloody mary mix is golden!
